sourcesContent: import React from "react"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom" import {updateCard} from "../utils/api/index" function CardForm({studyDeck, fnObj, card, setCard}){ let result const updateCardChange=({target})=>{ setCard({ ...card, [target.name]: target.value }) } const updateCardSubmit=(event)=>{ event.preventDefault(); } if(card===undefined){ result=( <>
